total_cases = int(raw_input())
while total_cases > 0:
	total_cases -= 1
	len_string = int(raw_input())
	list = [int(k) for k in raw_input().split()]
	counts = dict()
	for number in list:
		counts[number] = counts.get(number,0)+1
	max_rep = 0
	rep_number = None
	for a,b in counts.items():
		if b > max_rep:
			max_rep = b
			rep_number = a
		elif b == max_rep:
			if rep_number > a:
				rep_number = a
			
				
	print rep_number,max_rep
